name: DigaFooterCustomizer

infos.name: Footer bearbeiten und individualisieren
infos.description:
Footer ganz einfach individualisieren. Mit diesem Plugin lässt sich der Footer erweitern und anpassen.

  • Spaltenanzahl in zwölftel (1/12) granular steuern
  • Spaltenanzahl global anpassen
  • Spaltenanzahl je Footer-Navigation individuell übersteuern
  • Bilder, Skripte, Texte, Videos, etc. einfach über den Editor einbinden ( Hinweis: HTML Kenntnisse von Vorteil )
  • Footer Menü Überschriften ausblenden
  • Sichtbare Siegel, Badges & Bilder in mobiler Ansicht
  • Über den Default Kategorie-Editor steuerbar
  • Service Hotline deaktivieren
  • Shopware Copyright Logo deaktivieren
  • Copyright deaktivieren

10% Rabatt

infos.name: Edit and customize footer
infos.description:
Easily customize the footer. With this plugin, the footer can be expanded and adapted. 


  • Granular control of the number of columns in twelfth (1/12) 
  • Adjust the number of columns globally 
  • Override the number of columns per footer navigation individually 
  • Easily integrate images, scripts, texts, videos, etc. via the editor (note: HTML knowledge is an advantage) 

  • Hide footer menu headings

  • Visible seals, badges & images in mobile view

  • Can be controlled via the default category editor

  • Deactivate the service hotline

  • Deactivate the Shopware Copyright Logo

  • Deactivate copyright

Change the number of columns in the footer as desired

comments.text:
Das Plugin ist überhaupt nicht mit der aktuellen Version kompatibel. Deshalb kann ich das Produkt nicht bewerten.

Es macht mir auch nicht den Anschein, dass da ein Update kommt.

Leider keine Alternative vorhanden. Aber einen Probemonat für ein nicht funktionierendes Plugin ist auch nicht die Lösung.
comments.headline: Kompatibilität lässt auf sich warten

comments.text:
Wir sind eigentlich sehr zufrieden mit der Erweiterung. Sie tut was sie soll und wir können einfach den Footer ändern und individuell anpassen. Mega Funktion!
Ein Stern Abzug, weil die Updates immer sehr spät kommen, wir müssen ständig mit der Shopware Aktualisierung Wochen und Monate warten, da eine Kompatibilität dieses Plugins mit der neuen Shopware Version nicht vorhanden ist. Da wäre Nachholbedarf. :-)
comments.headline: Super Funktion, leider zu wenige Updates

comments.text: I wanted a flexible way of layouting my footer without changing the theme. This extension works very well. In the extension settings you can hide unwanted Shopware copyright notice, Service menu etc, at bottom + configure footer background color and font colors. Then you simply go to your categories and prepare a footer structure as you would normally do in Shopware. However with this extension , you'll notice that a powerful custom toggle, that allows replacing the normal category menu entry with content  you put in description text field. Obviously in that field you can put text and images etc. which then replaces the normal category menu entry. I run a multi language site, and had a few problems turning out to be not related to the plugin. Support was very fast, friendly and helped me solve my problems. Will buy more extensions from this vendor.
comments.headline: Flexible and well thought out - excellent fast support also!

changelog.text:
• Shopware 6.5 compatibility

HTML-Sanitize workaround if you still want to use HTML despite Shopware's precautionary security measures:

In this plugin case, we only have to allow HTML in the category description.

It would be different for each shop depending on what HTML tags and attributes they use in the footer, but we show the example with the img tag.

To allow the img tag in the category description, you need to edit the shopware.yaml file, which you can find under config/packages in your shop root folder.

If you already have the shopware.yaml file, add only "html_sanitizer" under "shopware:".
 If there is no shopware.yaml file, create it with the following text snippet:


shopware:
    html_sanitizer:
        sets:
            - name: digafooter
               tags: ["img"]
               attributes: ["src", "alt", "height", "width"]

        fields:
            - name: category_translation.description
               sets: ["basic", "digafooter"]

• hide footer vat Info
  • bug fix :  plugin activation behavior

• Added possibility to show category description and subcategories (if both exist, subcategories are shown first, then main category description).


ATTENTION:

The Description category no longer replaces the subcategories, content from the description is added after the subcategories if any. This way there are more options: you can only insert content from the description, but also add icons and other content after subcategory listing. It will affect those where the description replaces the subcategories. In this case, subcategories need to be removed/hidden to get the same layout again.
• Compatibility with other footer area plugins is guaranteed
• Background color, font and link color of the footer can be individually adjusted
